resources.string: Invalid USN. Check And Try Again.

\tEnter your USN before results are published. We\'ll send you the results after they are available.\n\tVTU server responds poorly when the results are published. VTU Result Notifier is an Android app that aims to solve this problem. The app is determined to provide the result once you enter the USN. Gone are the days when you reloaded the page multiple times with frustration.
Please provide feedback, suggestions or report bugs at:\n\nthe.era.labs@gmail.com

If you want to try out or contribute to the open source Python project that inspired this project, fork it at:
https://gitlab.com/aadarsh977/vtuResults!
